description: 經濟學旨在研究人們在資源有限的情況下如何做最佳的決策，又可分總體與個體二大領域。本學期將介紹個體經濟學的基本概念及分析方法，使學生能夠了解經濟學之相關議題和其在日常生活中的應用。

syllabus.zh:
(一) 經濟學基本概念
1.1 經濟學的十大原理
1.2 經濟部門與機會成本
1.3 交易原則:比較利益
(二) 供給與需求：市場如何運作
2.1 供給與需求的市場力量
2.2 彈性及其應用
2.3 供給,需求與政府政策
(三) 生產者行為與產業組織
3.1 生產成本
3.2 完全競爭市場
3.3 獨占
3.4 寡占
3.5 獨占性競爭
(四) 市場與福利
4.1 消費者剩餘,生產者剩餘和市場福利
4.2 課稅的成本
4.3 國際貿易
syllabus.en:
一、Introduction of Economics
二、Demand, Supply and Market Equilibrium
三、Price Elasticity
四、Consumer Choice
五、Cost and Production Decision
六、Competitive Market
七、Imperfect Competitive Market
八、Market and Government Interventio

weeklySchedule:
Week1: grading policy and course introduction
Week2: Part 1-introduction and goals of the firm and the fundamental economic concepts
Week3: demand analysis
Week4: estimating demand
Week5: business and economic forecasting
Week6: managing in the global economy
Week7: production economics
Week8: cost analysis
Week9: midterm examination
Week10: prices, output and strategy
Week11: price and output determination-monopoly and dominant firms
Week12: price and putput determination-oligopoly
Week13: best practice tactics-game theory
Week14: pricing techniques and analysis
Week15: contracting, governance and organizational form
Week16: government regulation
Week17: long term investment analysis
Week18: performance evaluation

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 具備基礎的經濟知識，了解經濟概念及分析方式。
能利用統計方法分析國際商務相關資料。
具備清晰邏輯思考及推理能力。
對經濟知識有主動學習的意願與動力。

textbook.title: managerial economics
textbook.author: James McGuigan, Charles Moyer, Frederick Harris
